mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAYOFF (OFF_CODE, ECODE, DEPT_CODE, OFF_START_DATE, OFF_END_DATE, OFF_DAYS, OFF_REASON) VALUES (SEQ_DAYOFF_CODE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{eCode}, #{deptCode}, #{offStartDate}, #{offEndDate}, #{offDays}, #{offReason})
mapper.select: SELECT OFF_CODE, OFF_START_DATE, OFF_END_DATE, OFF_DAYS, OFF_REASON, OFF_APPROVAL FROM DAYOFF WHERE ECODE = #{eCode} ORDER BY OFF_CODE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DAYOFF WHERE ECODE = #{eCode}

SELECT OFF_CODE, OFF_START_DATE, OFF_END_DATE, OFF_DAYS, OFF_REASON, OFF_APPROVAL FROM DAYOFF WHERE ECODE = #{eCode} AND OFF_END_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{offStartDate}) AND TO_CHAR(#{offEndDate}) OR OFF_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{offStartDate}) AND TO_CHAR(#{offEndDate}) ORDER BY OFF_START_DATE ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DAYOFF WHERE OFF_END_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{offStartDate}) AND TO_CHAR(#{offEndDate}) OR OFF_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{offStartDate}) AND TO_CHAR(#{offEndDate})

SELECT O.OFF_CODE, E.EMP_NAME AS ECODE, D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE, OFF_START_DATE, OFF_END_DATE, OFF_DAYS, OFF_REASON, OFF_ENROLLDATE, OFF_APPROVAL FROM DAYOFF O JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = O.ECODE JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE OFF_END_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{offStartDate}) AND TO_CHAR(#{offEndDate}) OR OFF_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{offStartDate}) AND TO_CHAR(#{offEndDate}) ORDER BY OFF_START_DATE ASC
SELECT D.OFF_ALL AS OFF_ALL FROM EMP E JOIN DAYOFF_COUNT D ON E.RANK_CODE = D.RANK_CODE JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CODE = D.RANK_CODE WHERE EMP_CODE = #{eCode}
SELECT NVL(SUM(OFF_DAYS), 0) AS OFF_USED FROM DAYOFF WHERE ECODE = #{eCode} AND OFF_APPROVAL = 'A'
SELECT R.RIGHT_CODE, E.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME FROM EMP E JOIN RIGHT R ON E.RIGHT_CODE = R.RIGHT_CODE WHERE E.EMP_CODE = #{eCode}

SELECT O.OFF_CODE, E.EMP_NAME AS ECODE, D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE, OFF_START_DATE, OFF_END_DATE, OFF_DAYS, OFF_REASON, OFF_ENROLLDATE, OFF_APPROVAL FROM DAYOFF O JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = O.ECODE JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE ORDER BY(CASE WHEN OFF_APPROVAL = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END)
SELECT E.DEPT_CODE FROM EMP E JOIN DEPT D ON D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE WHERE EMP_CODE = #{eCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE DAYOFF SET OFF_APPROVAL = #{offApproval} WHERE OFF_CODE = #{offCode}
